channel.title: Weird client error? dspk client
channel.description: [code] Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 6 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2568 at Animable_Sub5.method457(Animable_Sub5.java:50) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:33) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1502) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1036) at client.method146(client.java:14946) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9992) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10887) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6129) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code] help please, i get this randomly. In fact, its always a different out of bounds exception. this time its 2310. Help!

item.title: Weird client error? dspk client
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

My only guess is that you added items that require certain animations that your client doesnâ€™t have.

item.title: Weird client error? dspk client
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

Loaded 525 graphics...
Loaded Compressed Models..
Loading animations
Loaded the flo.
602 NPC Amount: 11257
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
6
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2568
        at Animable_Sub5.method457(Animable_Sub5.java:50)
        at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:33)
        at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10)
        at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1502)
        at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1036)
        at client.method146(client.java:14946)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9992)

        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
        at client.run(client.java:6129)

help please, i get this randomly. In fact, its always a different out of bounds exception. this time its 2310. Help!
